title: NBA Buzz: Knicks coach Derek Fisher, Grizzlies' Matt Barnes scuffle at party ... - NOLA.com
text:
Comments 
New York Knicks coach Derek Fisher and Memphis Grizzlies forward Matt Barnes were involved in a scuffle this past Saturday during a party at the home of Barnes' ex-wife, Gloria Govan, according to ESPN.com . 
The New York Post reported that Fisher and Govan are dating . Barnes attacked Fisher in the backyard of Govan's home during the party, according to reports. 
He's Back: Forward Kevin Durant scored 15 points on 5-of-8 shooting in 22 minutes in the Thunder's 122-99 victory against the Minnesota Timberwolves in its preseason opener. It was Billy Donovan's first game as the Thunder head coach. He hired former Pelicans coach Monty Williams as his lead assistant.
